app_descript:
IHG Hotels & Rewards

Brief: IHG Hotels & Rewards seamlessly combines your hotel bookings, reward tracking, and travel management in one dynamic app, covering over 6,000 destinations under 19 distinctive hotel brands. Tailored to both leisure and business travelers, the IHG One Rewards app is your trusted companion for exploring and booking hotels ranging from family-oriented Holiday Inn to the luxurious Iberostar Beachfront Resorts.
